item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0235; 04:05AM; 3337 W Pico Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JIDQNv; Arlington Heights; Firefighters responding to the report of an outside rubbish fire arrived to find flames extending into a one-story L-shaped strip mall. It took 28 firefighters 25 minutes (4:29am) to extinguish the fire. No reported injury. Fire investigators are enroute to investigate the fireâ€™s cause. LAPD Inc # 674. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E226 E229 E26 E29 E34 E66 EM11 RA34 RA68 RA829 T26 T29 T3; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1662; 10:06PM; 2821 E 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ldm5Gk; Boyle Heights; It took 41 firefighters 24 minutes to extinguish the attic fire, with no reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E17 E202 E209 E210 E25 E289 E5 E9 EM1 HR3 RA2 RA25 T10 T2 T89 T9 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1662; 09:42PM; 2821 E 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ldm5Gk; Boyle Heights; One-story school with fire showing from the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E17 E202 E209 E210 E25 RA2 RA25 T10 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Tree/Structure Fire; INC#1352; 06:54PM; WB 60 Tr x NB Golden State Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uqTo21; Boyle Heights; Approximately 60 palm trees caught fire adjacent to the 60 Freeway. Thankfully, the sound wall protected many nearby properties from most of the danger, but flames managed to hurdle the wall in one place and burned 5 autos, a detached garage, and (very minor damage to) a single-family home. Thirty-eight firefighters extinguished all aspects of this dynamic incident in approximately 44 minutes, without injury. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E10 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E211 E25 E3 E44 E47 RA17 RA25 T1 T11 T2 T9; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1352; 06:10PM; WB 60 Tr x NB Golden State Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uqTo21; Boyle Heights; Palm tree fire behind a neighborhood, now threatening structures and autos.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E1 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E25 E3 T1 T2; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0912; 01:45PM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; LAFD and LA County FD responding to a large three-story abandoned warehouse, where debris is burning beneath a collapse (from a previous burn). No reported injuries nor current threat to surrounding properties. This will be an extended operation to safely access flames under the debris and fully extinguish all hot spots. Expect to see fire department crews in the area for several hours, and traffic on Alameda Street heavily impacted (and at times completely closed). No further updates anticipated.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E10 E17 E2 E221 RA21 RA833 SQ21 T21 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0805; 12:46PM; 13778 W Desmond St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wBURoG; Pacoima; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story single-family home with smoke showing. It took 36 firefighters 14 minutes (1:00 PM) to fully extinguish the flames. No reported injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E287 E298 E91 E98 RA898 RA91 T75 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0860; 12:29PM; 1450 N Chautauqua Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DaEjWn; Pacific Palisades; A hiker (adult male) in need of medical attention is stranded in a remote area near Temescal Canyon Park. Rescuers on the ground hiked in to make initial patient contact and initiate care, while air support was en route. LAFD Air Ops arrived from Van Nuys Airport shortly after to hoist and transport the patient in moderate condition to a local hospital. Nothing further.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E69 H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1204; 05:23PM; 711 S La Brea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3umtRHg; Mid-Wilshire; *Corrected to Metro D Line (Purple)* Firefighter-paramedics made access to the patient in an area of the Purple (D) Line under construction and, sadly, found that the patient was deceased. Firefighters will remain on scene and continue to assist with recovery efforts. No other patients reported. Age/gender/affiliation/circumstances unknown. Nothing further. LAPD Inc # 3607.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E13 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E61 E68 EM11 HR3 RA61 RA94 SQ21 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH7; 15 16 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1204; 04:52PM; 711 S La Brea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3umtRHg; Mid-Wilshire; PRELIM - Metro B Line (Red): Firefighters have located one patient trapped under a train. Extrication operation is being set up by rescuers.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E13 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E61 E68 EM11 HR3 RA61 RA94 SQ21 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH7; 15 16; Nicholas Prange
